channel.title: Projects on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Introduction

item.title: <Compile/Her>
item.description: Worked to overcome future gender disparity in STEM fields by teaching middle school girls key computer science concepts. I designed and implemented a weekly curriculum for the students along with lesson modules for our annual capstone event. See our organization’s website!

item.title: PPSuite
item.description: What if you code execute C code with Microsoft PowerPoint?

item.title: Tetraka
item.description: My personal quest to build a website for online multiplayer in-browser tetris. Built on React, Typescript, Heroku, and tears.
